alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Jefferson; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. John The Baptist, northern St. Charles, southwestern Orleans and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 615 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Sarpy, or near Hahnville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Metairie, Hahnville, Laplace, Avondale, Jefferson, Harahan, Westwego, Killona, Norco, Elmwood, Montz, Luling, Bridge City, River Ridge, Ama, Destrehan, Waggaman, Taft, New Sarpy and St. Rose. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 208 and 232. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 610 near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Jefferson; Western Orleans
